ing: 1/2 (1 ounce) package dry onion soup mix
des: "This sauce can be made quickly with ingredients found in a well stocked cupboard, and is mighty tasty."
ins: In a medium bowl, mix together onion soup mix, sugar, ketchup, and Worcestershire sauce. Do not use until the last few minutes of cooking, because this sweet sauce will burn if cooked for too long or over too high heat.
